text: The discography for American country music singer Gretchen Wilson consists of 7 studio albums. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== Year Album details 2004 Here for the Party * Release date: May 11, 2004 * Label: Epic Nashville 2005 All Jacked Up * Release date: September 27, 2005 * Label: Epic Nashville 2007 One of the Boys * Release date: May 15, 2007 * Label: Columbia Nashville 2010 I Got Your Country Right Here * Release date: March 30, 2010 * Label: Redneck Records 2013 Right on Time * Release date: April 2, 2013 * Label: Redneck Records Under the Covers * Release date: June 4, 2013 * Label: Redneck Records 2017 Ready to Get Rowdy * Release date: June 16, 2017 * Label: Redneck Records ==Other album appearances== Year Song Album 2010 "Don't Come Home A-Drinkin' (With Lovin' on Your Mind)" Coal Miner's Daughter: A Tribute to Loretta Lynn 2019 "Barracuda" Live in Atlantic City "Even It Up" "Rock and Roll" ==References== Category:Discographies
title: Gretchen Wilson discography
